EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Spring London_London_Q217.Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the Spring London event!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Spring London Event.
Date: DAY-Tuesday, May 9th, 2017 {{my.Spring London:default=edit me}}
Time: 9:30AM to 4:30PM
Location: Pivotal The Bower, 211 Old Street - Floor 2 London, EC1V 9NR (map <[[https://www.google.co.uk/maps/place/Old+St,+London+EC1V+9NR/@51.5259091,-0.0912885,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x48761ca61bf76b2d:0x524bb1ae87636501!8m2!3d51.5258309!4d-0.0891406]]>)
We look forward to seeing you there.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email CONTACT at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/spring-london.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=confirmation-link&utm_campaign=spring_london_q22017]]>
